docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 20 (AP)--British diplomatic representatives today requested the Uruguayan Government to intern the German tanker Tacoma, alleging she had participated in destruction of the Admiral Graf Spee.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Dec. 20 (AP)--British diplomatic representatives today requested the Uruguayan Government to intern the German tanker Tacoma, alleging she had participated in destruction of the Admiral Graf Spee.
